## Runtime.ResourceResolverCacheActivity type

Type indicating the action performed on a [ResourceResolver](./ts-res.runtime.resourceresolver.md) cache.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ResourceResolverCacheActivity = 'hit' | 'miss' | 'error' | 'clear';
```
